activities:
ANSYS develops software which helps with complex design challenges through fast, accurate and reliable simulation. Our technology enables organizations to predict with confidence that their products will thrive in the real world. They use our software to help ensure product integrity and drive business success through innovation.  The information we handle includes:
(1)	Personal information received in the course of ANSYS’s activities, including information relating to individuals within corporate customers interested in or purchasing products provided by ANSYS, user information, unlicensed use information, support information, data analysis, sales and other transactions, marketing information and activities.
(2)	Personal information processed in the context of customers’ use of ANSYS products, where customers have submitted such information to a hosted product.
(3)	Human resources data and information relating to visitors to European sites. 

The personal information received by ANSYS from the EU includes both personal data that ANSYS processes as a data controller (i.e., ANSYS alone or jointly with others determines the purposes and means of the processing of the personal data) and personal data that ANSYS processes as a data processor on behalf of data controllers.
